title: Acting NASA Chief Confirms DOGE Audit of Space Agency Spending
summary: DOGE personnel arrive at NASA to conduct comprehensive spending review, initiating mass personnel evaluation and potential budget cuts
description: Elon Musk's Department of Government Efficiency (DOGE) begins detailed audit of NASA spending, implementing widespread review of contracts and staffing

sources.title: DOGE Workers Headed to NASA for Spending Review
Musk and Ramaswamy Say DOGE Will Target $500 Billion in Spending
As Musk Works to Slash Federal Spending, His Own Firms Received Billions

notes: DOGE audit raises significant conflict of interest concerns given Musk's SpaceX contracts
